record.title: HIRE A VETERAN WEEK
record.chair: The unfinished business is the question of suspending the rules and agreeing to the concurrent resolution, H. Con. Res. 5.
record.narrative: The Clerk read the title of the concurrent resolution.
record.chair: The question is on the motion offered by the gentleman from New Jersey (Mr. Holt) that the House suspend the rules and agree to the concurrent resolution, H. Con. Res. 5, on which the yeas and nays are ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I was unduly delayed for the vote on H. Con. Res. 5, Expressing the Support for the designation and goals of "Hire a Veteran Week." Had I been able to vote, I would have voted "yea" on H. Con. Res. 5.

The Armed Services provide invaluable experience to the men and women who serve this great nation. With this experience, veterans are an extremely valuable asset to our workforce in Southern Nevada and throughout the United States.
